name: getIdProviderAuthDomain
description: Get an IdP authentication domain for the given id.

id.description: ID of the IdP Authentication Domain to be retrieved.

$ul: **entityId**: Entity ID of the Id Provider (IdP).
**organizationId**: ID of the organization that added the authentication domain.
**signCert**: The Identity Provider (IdP) X509 certificate, stored using the PEM format, used to sign the SAML assertion.
**signCertExpiryDate**: The expiry date of the Identity Provider (IdP) X509 certificate. The date is a string with the ISO-8601 format like 2017-01-23T20:12:45.000Z with milliseconds precision.
**skewnessInSec**: The clock skewness tolerance, in seconds, between the Identity Provider (IdP) and the Rubrik cluster.
**ssoUrl**: The Identity Provider (IdP) endpoint that Rubrik sends authentication request to in order to initiate SSO login.
